title: Employment Minister Unaware When Department Employees Were Being Investigated for Falsely Claiming CERB Benefits
description: The landing page for the Canada Emergency Response Benefit is seen in Toronto on Aug. 10, 2020. (The Canadian Press/Giordano Ciampini)

title: North Korea Test-Fires Nuclear Cruise Missiles From Submarine
description: North Korea fires two missiles from a submarine striking an underwater target, according to state media, at an undisclosed location in North Korea, on March 12, 2023, in this photo released by North Korea's Korean Central News Agency (KCNA). (KCNA via Reuters)

title: Record-Strength Cyclone Freddy Displaces Hundreds in 2nd Mozambique Landfall
description: Fallen branches on a street as Storm Freddy is due to hit Mozambique again, in Quelimane, Zambezia, Mozambique, on March 11, 2023, in this screengrab obtained from a video. (UNICEF Mozambique/2023/Alfredo Zuniga/Handout via Reuters)

title: Chinese City Plans Flu Lockdowns as Outbreaks Surge Across the Country, Top Virologist Warns of Next COVID-19 Wave
description: Patients are cared for by relatives and medical staff as they are seen on beds set up in the atrium area of a busy hospital in Shanghai, China, on Jan. 13, 2023. (Kevin Frayer/Getty Images)

title: ‘Ewe-Turn’ Needed on Live Export Ban
description: Workers transfer beef cattle imported from Australia at a port in Qingdao, east China's Shandong Province, on April 15, 2018. (AFP via Getty Images)

title: Canada Foreign Agent Registry: No Timeline for Creation Offered by Public Safety Minister
description: Minister of Public Safety Marco Mendicino rises during question period in the House of Commons on Parliament Hill in Ottawa on March 7, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Justin Tang)

title: Michael Taube: Ottawa’s ‘Special Rapporteur’ to Look Into Foreign Interference Won’t Be So Special
description: The Parliament buildings as seen from the Ottawa River on Sept. 7, 2022. (The Canadian Press/Adrian Wyld)

title: UK Government Works to Minimize SVB Fallout
description: The main entrance of Silicon Valley Bank in Menlo Park, Calif., on March 10, 2023. (Michaela Vatcheva/Reuters)

title: Weather Warning as Record-Breaking Floods Continue in Australia
description: In this photo provided by the Queensland Fire and Emergency Services, water floods land and buildings near Gympie, north of Brisbane, Australia Sunday, Feb. 27, 2022. Heavy rain is bringing record flooding to some east coast areas and claimed seven lives while the flooding in Brisbane, a population of 2.6 million, and its surrounds is the worst since 2011 when the city was inundated by what was described as a once-in-a-century event. (Queensland Fire and Emergency Services via AP)

title: Japan to Deploy Over 100 Ammunition Storage Facilitates
description: Japanese Defence Minister Yasukazu Hamada (R) speaks to Japanese Maritime Defence Force officers (L) at the Defence Ministry in Tokyo on January 28, 2009. (AFP/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Anthony Furey: Three Years After the Pandemic Began, What Have We Learned?
description: A man walks past a COVID-19 mural on a rainy day during the pandemic, in Toronto on April 12, 2021. (Nathan Denette/The Canadian Press)

title: Veterans Affairs Canada Closes Investigation, Confirms Four Incidents Where MAiD ‘Inappropriately Discussed’
description: A person touches the helmet on the Tomb of the Unknown Soldier after laying a poppy, at the National War Memorial following the National Remembrance Day Ceremony in Ottawa on Nov. 11, 2022. (The Canadian Press/Justin Tang)

title: Windfall Taxes Just Add More Problems to the Energy Crisis
description: A tourist photographs the gas production area at the Woodside operated North West Shelf Gas Venture in the north of Western Australia, on June 16, 2008. (Greg Wood/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Chinese Ambassador to Japan Resigns Upon Failure to Complete CCP-Tasked Missions
description: (From L-R) Chinese Ambassador to Japan Kong Xuanyou, Keidanren Chairman Masakazu Tokura, former prime minister Yasuo Fukuda, former speaker of the lower house Yohei Kono, former secretary-general of the Liberal Democratic Party Toshihiro Nikai, and Foreign Minister Yoshimasa Hayashi make a toast at the reception commemorating the 50th anniversary of the normalization of Japan-China diplomatic relations in Tokyo on Sept. 29, 2022. (Jiji Press / AFP / Japan OUT via Getty Images)

title: UK Tech Firms Face ‘Serious Risk’ From Silicon Valley Bank Collapse, Chancellor Warns
description: A customer stands outside of a shuttered Silicon Valley Bank (SVB) headquarters in Santa Clara, Cali. on March 10, 2023. (Justin Sullivan/Getty Images)

title: New South Wales Liberals to Seed $400 Future Accounts for Children
description: NSW Premier Dominic Perrottet speaks to the media during a press conference at Rosehill Public School in Sydney, Australia, Jan. 31, 2022. (AAP Image/Bianca De Marchi)

title: More Rain on the Way as Record-Breaking Queensland Flood Peaks
description: A screenshot of supplied vision of flooding in Burketown Queensland on Saturday, March 11, 2023. A broad swathe of Queensland is being warned about the threat of thunderstorms as the northwest grapples with its worst floods in years. (AAP Image/Supplied by Queensland Police) NO ARCHIVING, EDITORIAL USE ONLY

title: ‘We Are Urging Individuals to Avoid Travel to Mexico’: Officials Issue Warning After 3 Go Missing
description: Mexican authorities search for evidence to locate four Americans who were shot by gunmen and then kidnapped shortly after crossing the border from Brownsville, Texas, to Matamoros, Mexico, on March 6, 2023. (Stringer/Reuters)

title: Former FBI Official Warns Against Mexico Travel
description: Soldiers stand guard outside the Forensic Medical Service morgue building ahead of the transfer of the bodies of two of four Americans kidnapped by gunmen to the U.S. border, in Matamoros, Mexico, on March 9, 2023. (Daniel Becerril/Reuters)

title: Avalanche Canada Releases Details on BC Avalanche That Killed Three Germans
description: An avalanche hazard warning of "considerable" is shown near Mount Renshaw outside of McBride, B.C., on Jan. 30, 2016. (The Canadian Press/Darryl Dyck)

title: Biden May Give European Automakers US Tax Credit for Battery, Critical Mineral Production
description: Volkswagen, Europe’s largest automaker, is among manufacturers lobbying the European Union to adopt a “green incentive” package similar to those included in the United States’ Inflation Reduction Act or instead of building factories in Europe, they will do so in the United States. (Fabian Bimmer/Reuters)

title: More Than 40 Vehicles Involved in Highway Pileup in Hungary
description: Firefighters work among smoldering cars after several trucks and cars crashed on M1 motorway near Herceghalom, Hungary, on March 11, 2023. (Peter Lakatos/MTI via AP)

title: Has Wokeness Peaked? That’s Debatable
description: A LGBT activist holds pins about gender pronouns, on the University of Wyoming campus in Laramie, Wyoming, on Aug. 13, 2022. (Patrick T. Fallon/AFP via Getty Images)
